results.title: Of inquiry requesting the President, and directing the Attorney General, to transmit, respectively, certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to certain communications by the President of the United States.
results.short_title: Of inquiry requesting the President, and directing the Attorney General, to transmit, respectively, certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to certain communications by the President of the United States.
results.latest_major_action: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 35.
results.summary: Requests the President, and directs the Department of Justice, to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any document, correspondence, or other communication in their possession that refers or relates to specified statements of President Donald J. Trump communicated via Twitter on March 4, 2017, regarding alleged wiretapping in Trump Tower by former President Barack Obama.
results.summary_short: Requests the President, and directs the Department of Justice, to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any document, correspondence, or other communication in their possession that refers or relates to specified statements of President Donald J. Trump communicated via Twitter on March 4, 2017, regarding alleged wiretapping in Trump Tower by former President Barack Obama.

actions.description: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 35.
Reported adversely (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 115-83.
Ordered to be Reported Unfavorably (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 15.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
